thread.title: Times Square Gem
thread.title_full: Times Square Gem - Review of The Knickerbocker, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Chris F
title: Times Square Gem
text: The Knickerbocker Hotel is a Leading Hotel of the world for good reason. It is located in Times Square near excellent restaurants and attractions. The Hotel d√©cor is modern with good sized quiet rooms, an excellent restaurant and a roof top bar. The service from check in, to room deliveries to check out was fast and seamless. This hotel is a new favorite for our next visit to mid town New York City.
